items.sentence: What's the most embarrassing thing that has ever happened to you?
Tom's answer shows that he's missed the whole point of the story.
What Tom thought was a harmless joke, soon became deadly serious.
Tom went to bed early because he had an early start the next day.
Tom and his team worked around the clock to get the job finished.
Tom went down into the cellar and returned with a bottle of wine.
It would be wise not to let Tom know what your opinion of him is.
Why do humans smile? This is a very difficult question to answer.
If you have an indoor swimming pool, you're probably pretty rich.
Before becoming a famous actor, Tom worked as a personal trainer.
